snippet: With more than 46,000 exotic animals seized from traffickers, vendors and trappers, the country’s wildlife centers are overwhelmed.
abstract: Thai government faces quandary of what to do with exotic animals it has seized from traffickers, vendors and trappers; more than 46,000 animals have been rescued in last two years, and wildlife center across the country are already at capacity.
lead_paragraph: With more than 46,000 exotic animals seized from traffickers, vendors and trappers, the country’s wildlife centers are overwhelmed.

headline.seo: Thailand Cracks Down on Wildlife Trafficking, and Faces a Noah’s Ark-Size Burden of Care
headline.main: A Burden of Care Over Seized Exotic Wildlife in Thailand
headline.print_headline: A Burden of Care Over Seized Exotic Wildlife in Thailand

keywords.value: Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species
keywords.name: organizations
